scenario: You run a small online shop based in Manhattan (zip 10019). A buyer in Los Angeles (zip 90028) is returning an item and you need to estimate the FedEx Ground cost for the 3-pound return, locate a staffed FedEx location near 10019 to drop off the return, and verify the return label scan by looking up tracking info for shipment #3023858502. At the same time, your supplier in Texas is preparing a 4-pound replacement to ship to New York, so you also want to calculate that shipping cost to reconcile refund and replacement shipping charges.
combined_task: Manage a customer return and replacement: estimate the outbound and inbound FedEx shipping costs, find a staffed local FedEx drop-off, and verify the relevant tracking.
selected_subtasks: Calculate a FedEx Ground shipping rate for a 3-pound package from zip code 10019 to zip code 90028.
Find a staffed FedEx location near zip code 10019 to return a package.
Look up tracking information for shipment #3023858502.
Calculate the shipping cost for 4 pound package from Texas to New York.
